name: Birbo
description: Experience the world of Birbo in this FPS/Tower Defense game. This game was made for the LDJam 41 with my team, team float_goat. Consisting of me, Cole, Tytus, and Jacob. In the game there are plots where you can make buildings and those buildings help you defeat waves of enemies (called the birbo).  Known Bugs: the marine spawn button is there just down a bit.
